articles.title: Will Coronavirus Vaccine be Available to All in India? Here’s What AIIMS Director Guleria Has to Say - India.com
articles.description: Saying that vaccines in India are in their final trial stage, AIIMS Director Dr Guleria expressed hope that vaccine should be available by the end of this month or early next month.
